website_summaries.verdict: Simple blanket design, but it works well to keep you warm when you're in the vehicle.
pros: Includes an 8-foot power cord, so you can position the heated travel blanket in the most convenient location in the car
With a 12-volt power adapter, it plugs easily into any vehicle power outlet
Includes an LED light to alert you when it's drawing power
cons: Doesn't generate a ton of heat, which will disappoint some users

customer_reviews.title: I use it in my van for winter camping and it is better than nothing
customer_reviews.text: It gets slightly warm. I use it in my van for winter camping and it is better than nothing, but its a far cry from being "toasty" warm. 5-31-17 I've used it multiple times in my van, runs off of my house battery unit. It does make it nicer when van camping on Colorado passes at 10,000+'. It's not "hot" but is warm. 3-3-18 Still working. I have it under the mattress cover. Still keeping us comfortable during 0 degree weather in the van. Not “hot” or “toasty “ warm, but is comfortable with a good top blanket. Consumes roughly 35% of my house battery per 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: brett

customer_reviews.title: So far so good from Adventure Driven
customer_reviews.text: This is our second heated blanket. The first one lasted about 2 years. We replaced it with this one as the original blanket was not getting really hot, the new one defiantly is hot, we camp about 100 nights per year as our social media content business Adventure Driven allows us to be outside allot. We have a howling moon rooftop tent and we leave it the blanket up in the tent. When it's cold outside we just plug it into the outlet I ran up to the roof rack. So far so good
customer_reviews.author: Seth Jacobsen

customer_reviews.title: Toasty
customer_reviews.text: This is one great little blanket, especially if your outlets work when your vehicle is off. I've slept in the back of my suv with this thing underneath me at a truck stop one frozen night - it was in the low 20s - and I was toasty with a down throw on top. You obviously can't leave it on all night unless you want to wake up to a dead battery but an hour is plenty anyway. I feel like most people will use this as a lap blanket on a road trip but if you're doing some van or truck sleeping this blanket is really useful.
customer_reviews.author: HG Marks

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect for those chilly winter mornings when you have to drive to work and don't have time to wait for the car to warm up. Takes a little bit of time to actually get warm, but it's faster than the heater in my car. Also the material feels nice and warm by itself. Good quality for the right price.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Linville

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: This blanket has exceeded my expectations. It is warm by itself without even being plugged into the power outlet in the car. The material feels almost like a mix between fleece & felt. I’m using it on top of a vehicle heater etc but our temps are very cold & damp with several feet of snow around as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camping addition
customer_reviews.text: While camping, my husband and I sleep in the back of our Suburban on a full size air mattress. I used this heated blanket as a "mattress cover" and we slept on it with a comforter over top of us. It got down to 28 degrees that night, and we stayed nice and warm. We did have to turn the car on for a couple minutes I'm the middle of the night because our faces were cold, but our bodies stayed cozy. I could see this being very useful for covering up while driving also.
customer_reviews.author: SMelius22

customer_reviews.title: I was happy with the thickness of the blanket
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with the thickness of the blanket. It's the size of a throw blanket which I was pleased with.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome if you tend to be cold!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this blanket! When I take a break at work I can lay down in the back of my SUV and plug it in in the back and still stay warm in the winter. When traveling I can plug it into the front and use it in the passenger seat as well. It gets very warm but not too hot. Would highly recommend If you are a cold bodied person.
customer_reviews.author: Crazed reader

customer_reviews.title: Keeps You Nice and Warm
customer_reviews.text: I lost the heat in my 2012 Jeep and between all of the back and forth of trying to fix it, my daughter suggested this blanket to keep me warm on my daily commutes. Blanket was a life saver! Nice and soft, thick and it kept me warm. I just wish it had been smaller in size. I felt it was too large to safely use as the driver so I would spend a good 5 minutes arranging it so that it wouldn't interfere with my driving (shift, foot pedals, etc.) But this blanket would be ideal for a passenger to use.
customer_reviews.author: Debby O.

customer_reviews.title: A Hit with My Always-Chilled Wife
customer_reviews.text: My wife often complains she is cold while in my truck. Cranking the heat up nearly drives me out, so I bought this heated blanket, and she loves it! It gets toasty warm quickly, keeps her warm, and I can keep the heat set to my liking, The only thing I can see being a problem is the inability to wash this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: tBob

customer_reviews.title: I love it. And it is very soft
customer_reviews.text: I work nights and its has been so cold, I have been using the blanket folded and sitting on it. So warm! I love it. And it is very soft. Might have to just buy one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: michshoe

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cozy warm blanket.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect device to keep me warm on nights that I camping. I use a portable lithium ion battery inverter to plug this blanket into which is inside my sleeping bag. Heats me and that sleeping bag up in a few minutes. Blanket shuts itself off after 20 minutes but the heat is contained in the sleeping bag so I'm snug as a bug in a rug.
customer_reviews.author: Medic Karen

customer_reviews.title: It was great for when my daughter did not have a heater ...
customer_reviews.text: it does what is suppose to do. It was great for when my daughter did not have a heater in the car.
customer_reviews.author: jicala

customer_reviews.title: Almost caught fire
customer_reviews.text: Used for a week and the cords melted through the blanket and remote.
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Passenger side of my parents’ car does not push out the same amount of heat from heater as the driver’s side puts out. So to help keep Mom warm and keep Dad from roasting, I gave this to Mom. Working great! Not sure if it would drain the car battery if left plugged in while the car motor was not running- so we all make sure to disconnect the blanket before exiting the vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: LLM

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: bought as gift, had strong plastic smell. person that received noted tag that stated it had components that caused cancer. they returned the gift... also noted it was scratchy
customer_reviews.author: Coastiewife

customer_reviews.title: Great for Chicago winters
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one of these for myself and a bunch more for Christmas gifts. Heats well and very soft, I keep it in my front seat now that Chicago winters are becoming fierce again. Don't make the same mistake I made and leave it plugged in - completely dead car battery in 20 MINUTES. But I was warm while I waited for the tow truck to jump my battery...
customer_reviews.author: chicago

customer_reviews.title: Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Warm, had it on my lap all the way home on a 6 hour winter car trip. Operated flawlessly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: Died in less than a month with light use.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. My expectations were low at this price, but it's already broken after a few weeks and I barely used the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get hot just a nice cozy warm
customer_reviews.text: It can get cold in Missouri and I don't have a place to let my car warm up in the winter. My car is also slow to warm up so I got one of these to put over my daughter in her car seat. It doesn't get hot just a nice cozy warm which is perfect for those extra cold days.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great! The only thing I wish it had was a adjustable function. It’s either on or off but besides that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's warm
customer_reviews.text: This blanket warms quickly and stays at a warm temperature! It does not get Hot where you could get burned. I have not left it plugged in when the car has been running to see the drain on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: TheTebo

customer_reviews.title: When I drive I like to keep the car pretty cool regardless as to ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this for our trips. When I drive I like to keep the car pretty cool regardless as to what time of the year it is. This works great so she isn't freezing.
customer_reviews.author: hamsterwmca

customer_reviews.title: A blanket that will keep you always warm.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice blanket. It not only looks great but works very good as well. My wife uses a blanket in the car all year round and really likes this one the best from others that were purchased in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Straight Shooter

customer_reviews.title: Great travel blanket
customer_reviews.text: This heats up nicely. Not too warm, but very comfortable. Helps keep me warm without making all other passengers uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Beth T

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well
customer_reviews.text: I used this blanket all through the winter. I does reak of chemicals but I think it's benefit outweighs that. The size is perfect. As a tall person finding a blanket that is long enough to wrap around my feet and still reach my shoulders is difficult but this blanket did the trick. I would say it could probably be used by two people. It heats up within a few minutes which is pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a friend who often naps between college classes in her car. She says it heats up quickly, keeps her warm and comfortable and takes the chill off on cold winter days.
customer_reviews.author: elissa

customer_reviews.title: Would also be great in an emergency
customer_reviews.text: I use this heated blanket in my electric car. Keeps me warm enough to not need the heat in the Minnesota winter. It is bigger than expected, but I can fold it to fit my lap and knees.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Jukiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and useful product.
customer_reviews.text: My car heater was broken and I found that this item really did help me keep warm in the winter months driving around in Los Angeles. Nice product - warm and comfy. Also, I like it cool in the car when I am driving so as to stay away, but my wife needs to be warmer, so this is a great solution to keep her warm while I keep my cool! It would also be useful for staying warm in the back seat if the heater was not reaching you. I would recommend this for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: Not for use while the car is off
customer_reviews.text: I got this product to take to the drive in movies on cold nights. It was very warm. Heated up quickly and was very cozy. I really loved this blanket until we tried to crank the car up and found it drained the battery. I had been using it for about 4 hours with the ignition turned to aux.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm, but Tricky to Wash
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my toddler to use in the backseat during the cold Minnesota winters and it always worked perfectly. The tricky part is washing it - I would lay it flat on the counter and dip a washcloth in soapy, then clean water to wash it. I had the blanket for 3 years and then passed it down to a friend. Just make sure you take care of it - don't let it bunch, keep it dry, don't pile things on top of it (whether it's on or not), and if you're letting kids use it, monitor how long it's on them - especially for road trips (you can unplug the blanket once the car warms up).
customer_reviews.author: sunny

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok - so my girlfriend is ALWAYS cold when we ride in the car together. I can't stay in the car when she is comfortable without becoming a ball of sweat and she shivers unless the heater is up all the way all the time. So - we comprimised. The heater stays on, but at a lower temp that I can handle, and she uses this blanket. It takes a bit of time to warm up (10-15 minutes), but as it is a blanket it does work even without the heating element for keeping people warm. No problems so far - we have been using it about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Steve-o

customer_reviews.title: Been looking for this type of blanket to plug into ...
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for this type of blanket to plug into the car for over 30 years! My Dad froze in the car during cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Tech 72

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable warmth
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our daughter-in-law, who is very cold natured and has a rather long drive to work. She LOVES it! Keeps her toasty warm and comfortable on cold winter days.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: The perfect addition for little one in the back seat. The cord stretches so that it covers the back seat and keeps my little ones nice and toasty on those cold days- beware it will spoil them lol
customer_reviews.author: Suesim

customer_reviews.title: Spouse is warm!
customer_reviews.text: We have this blanket on a Polaris Slingshot, three wheeled motorcycle, my wife is warm and toasty!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: it would be that it's a bit small (looks like a toddler's blanket) and it has no temperature control ...
customer_reviews.text: Works surprisingly well for so little money. If I had any complaints, it would be that it's a bit small (looks like a toddler's blanket) and it has no temperature control (it's either plugged in and on or unplugged and off). Still, for 20 bucks, it works well enough to have to toss the covers off every once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rossell

customer_reviews.title: Not much warmer then a traditional blanket
customer_reviews.text: Warms up a little bit but not much. Probably better off just putting a regular blanket in your car.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: A+++
customer_reviews.text: Worked well during my winter car trip. Heated up well. Would use again.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgyrl

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. I gave it only 4 stars ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I gave it only 4 stars as you cannot control the temperature or establish a time period for it to turn off. Those features would have made this a 5 star no doubt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice blanket. I'm a truck driver and I have ...
customer_reviews.text: very nice blanket. I'm a truck driver and I have a cooler on the passenger seat for my little Chihuahua to ride in. I have the blanket in the cooler so these cold mornings I start the truck up is very nice to plug the blanket in. Once the blanket warms up I put my Chihuahua on the blanket and she just loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Harper

customer_reviews.title: Idea is good, plug does not stay in on any plug ...
customer_reviews.text: Idea is good, plug does not stay in on any plug we have. So unless we held the plug into the socket it would not work. Never got hot orwarm for that matter because i refused to sit there and hold the plug in
customer_reviews.author: PerezScott

customer_reviews.title: Failed to produce any heat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a camping trip as a backup blanket (warehouse deal). The blanket powered on but never produced any heat. Returned to amazon....
customer_reviews.author: Coasters16

customer_reviews.title: Fire hazard
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! The cord gets hotter than the blanket!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lissa

customer_reviews.title: SUPER
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for Christmas from my sister. I came back to buy 2 more. They are a real asset in the cold Minnesota winters. I have used it for long trips and shorter trips and have had several people use it when we went out as a group. It is so nice. I would love it to have multiple settings for the heat but it is just toasty warm and that is fine. After getting in an ice cold vehicle this heats up quickly and takes the chill off. I used it when I had a terrible cold and it really helped keep me warm during the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Gail M. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great travel blanket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother-in-law who is a long haul truck driver. He loves it! He said it works great and is just what he needed for keeping warm on those nights sleeping in the cab. Also perfect to keep in your trunk for road trips or in case of emergency. The polar fleece is warm on it own, it's extra toasty when you plug it in! Another great product from Roadpro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: It get warm very quickly and has a long cord...
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl 305

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We'd prefer a slightly longer cord and a slightly wider blanket for sharing in the backseat from a front seat outlet, but it is exactly as advertised. It keeps the kids warm on those bitter, sub-freezing morning drives!
customer_reviews.author: Intelligent Parent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This one keeps you toasty on the road, The little woman loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: bigtuna189

customer_reviews.title: it's awesome. It's not a full blanket though
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my boat, it's awesome. It's not a full blanket though, so my 6' frame something is left in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: The only problem that has been seen since we got ...
customer_reviews.text: The only problem that has been seen since we got this blanket is that you have to have it plugged at the right angle or it will not turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Meissa

customer_reviews.title: Quit working... 🤨🥶
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket, bit on the small side but quit working after about 3-4 weeks. Used it on and off few hours daily.
customer_reviews.author: Darius Bur

customer_reviews.title: Plug broke after a few uses.
customer_reviews.text: Blanket turns out to be nice, but what took away from it receiving 5 stars was the fact that the cigarette lighter 12v plug broke only have a couple of uses.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ebanks

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my mother who is always cold and is doing a lot of traveling this year
customer_reviews.author: Tiffinie

customer_reviews.title: Warm Trip Companion
customer_reviews.text: This blanket was super useful during a recent trip to cold weather. It plugged right in and immediate spread a warm wave of heat over every inch. The blanket was soft enough to fall asleep under. The controls are easy to adjust and it now comes with us on all road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas Gift for my Daughter-in-law after she saw mine and liked it. This is perfect for long drives when occupants of the car don't agree on the temperature. I love mine - it's nice and cozy. I do recommend being careful when pulling the plug out of the dash. Mine had to be repaired with electrical tape but it still works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Queen

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, stays on when plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: Good size blanket, could be a little bit bigger in order to cover feet to shoulders, but will do. Nicest feature is that it does not have one of those 'safety' features for the careless, it wont turn off unless you unplug it. Nice to have it on and plugged in while driving for hours (passenger has it on, not the driver :-) )
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my cousin, who always has a blanket in her car because she's always cold, especially while warming up the car. She has since told me that she absolutely loves the blanket. It was the perfect gift for her and she has been using it continually throughout this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Joanny

customer_reviews.title: Love having this to keep my legs warm while traveling ...
customer_reviews.text: Love having this to keep my legs warm while traveling in the car with a spouse that doesn't like the heater on in the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Waterdog57

customer_reviews.title: Heated Throw
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for me. I have a bad back and I took this with us on our trip. What should have been a 4 1/2 hour drive ended up being a 7 1/2 hour trip.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad option to warm up quickly in the winter time
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad option to warm up quickly in the winter time. A little uncomfortable and stiff, but heats quickly. Used it as a seat cover so I wouldn't freeze getting into my car in the mornings. Doesn't have an off switch so if you forget to take the plug out it will kill your car battery.
customer_reviews.author: Myles Deacon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife to use in the bow of our boat and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell B.

customer_reviews.title: This was a very thoughtful and useful gift! I love it
customer_reviews.text: Husband bought me this as a gift. I ride a ferry in the winter to commute to work and sit in my car. This was a very thoughtful and useful gift! I love it! It doesn't get too hot, but it keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product. It requires very little power but keeps you very warm. I will use it on camping trips with a 12v battery pack so it is perfect for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Little

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my truck driver husband. He absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne Townsend

customer_reviews.title: A Great Idea
customer_reviews.text: Very warm and soft blanket wire is the perfect length for me. It made a good Christmas present. Good for a truck driver or someone who drives a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Eduard Astakhov

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my Grandparents who live in the North East- They're thrilled! They no longer dread getting in the car on cold days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for anyone traveling to cold areas
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a relative that sometimes sleeps in a trailer on his property in the mountains where it gets cold. Great product for anyone traveling to cold areas. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Foley

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my Dad and ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my Dad and we are going to have to return it. It gets so hot it's unbearable. I didn't realize when ordering it that the temperature is not adjustable. Strange to have a blanket where you can't select a low setting. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bears dad

customer_reviews.title: It is great, especially since the heater in my car only ...
customer_reviews.text: It is great, especially since the heater in my car only seems to work on the drivers side. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L Loyd

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It worked three times. Then it smelled like burning rubber. After that it would no longer work.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Milbrath

customer_reviews.title: Heats quickly and works well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 80 year old grandma because she is always cold in the car. We sushi ally turn the heat in so she is comfortable but it means stripping down to tank tops for the rest of us! Now she can have her warmth and the rest if us can also be comfortable in the car!
customer_reviews.author: theboyds

customer_reviews.title: Great for my back pain!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!! Now if I could just find my converter I would be using it all the time!
customer_reviews.author: awilkesrn

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my wife for Christmas, and she absolutely loves it! It heats up pretty quickly to keep her warm...and reduces the need for me to blast the heat in the car. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Reid

customer_reviews.title: winter heating
customer_reviews.text: This was my wifes favourite gift this Christmas...... she was never cold as long as we remembered to re- set the blanket before going into a restaurant as it takes a long time to warm up. It is also good to move from seat to seat or from car to car.
customer_reviews.author: Les Brown

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't get very warm
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't get very warm, which deeply disappointed me. I have now learned that the low heat setting isn't their fault; it has more to do with the amount of energy the car plug-ins can process than with blanket capability. Apparently all blankets plugged in this way will run on low heat. Still, the blanket is most definitely better than nothing. I sure don't want to be caught in cold weather without it.
customer_reviews.author: S. C.

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: One small area at the top got luke warm but the rest was cold.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket for having over your lap on a cold ...not for cuddling up with
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket for having over your lap on a cold day. It does not get "heater" hot, it gets comfortably warm around 98 degrees. I use it twice and now it no longer works. The material is decent, however the heating material is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Gets warm fast
customer_reviews.text: I live in Park City, UT. In the winter, a morning drive means freezing in the car for 5 minutes until it heats up. This blanket, even when left in the car to freeze overnight, warms up my lap and legs FAST after starting the car. It doesn't get really warm to the touch, just warm enough that if you actually use it as a blanket, it's very effective.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin N. Dilts

customer_reviews.title: Great 12v electric blanket
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my new RV experiences and it is a wonderful product. Heats quickly in RV and is nice and cozy. This is nice on a road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Wasserman

customer_reviews.title: Warm!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to my teenage daughter who always seems to be cold...especially in the car. Used it on a long trip up north and she wrapped up in it and loved it. It kept her very warm. It doesn't have any settings, just on or off so you just turn it off if you get too warm. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PDS

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it! That says it all. Very happy with the blanket. My wife said I don't need that, plugged it in and uses it everyday so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Molgaard

customer_reviews.title: Great for power outage!
customer_reviews.text: We got hit by a surprise blizzard this winter knocking power out all over. I have a battery charger just in case I ever need it. Well I ordered this and an adapter, no more suffering. I love that it plugs in the car battery too. Will take on the road with me in bad weather.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn11

customer_reviews.title: its nice warmed up and also in summer to use for ...
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in the car at all times of the year, its nice warmed up and also in summer to use for a pillow. It doesn't get too hot where I'm afraid to let my kids use it. It will kill battery if left plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Austin

customer_reviews.title: Dead, Dead and Dead
customer_reviews.text: This product worked two times; only plugged into the 12 V auto receptacle. On the third usage; no heat. Nothing I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Roy

customer_reviews.title: Helps fight the frigid cold
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because the heat in my car is not the best. I'm soon purchasing a new car and didn't want to invest a lot of money in repairs. I place this blanket over my lap and it helps to keep me warm. It doesn't get hot, but there is definetly warmth and the fleece blanket is soft and the perfect size for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts for ATV owners!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best for going on a four wheeler ride, side by side or other outdoor activities when it is snowy and cold outside. Great for adults and kids! We love ours!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the plug over heats in a short period of time and starts to smell
customer_reviews.author: ctctct

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought one again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same item again so both in the back seat stay warm. (New High Country with no heat in the back seat area).
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa Ric

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife and she loves it! She had been using it every morning on her way to work for a few months now and it still works great especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Devaughn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your pup in the winter!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my min pin, whenever we went somewhere in the car he was always freezing! Plug it in your lighter outlet and it gets nice and toasty! He loved going places with this handy blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Gypsy71671

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as hot as I would expect but love it
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: This is great to carry in the car
customer_reviews.text: This is great to carry in the car, especially if you have cold leather seats. Make sure you turn it off/ unplug when your car is off, you might come out to a dead battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it shows and works like it described
customer_reviews.text: Looks like it shows and works like it described. However, I quickly found out that I would like a detachable, and adaptable plug, as well as, the ability to throw it in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: GR8 SALES

customer_reviews.title: I Recommend for people who transport older children who are old ...
customer_reviews.text: got this because my daughter is always cold riding the car. She loves it. I Recommend for people who transport older children who are old enough to stay calm and not wiggly. Also would be good for people who transport fragile elders.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you toasty warm, could not put in washing machine due to cords.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Kinlen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel blanket. My husband and I are polar opposites when it comes to temperature. I live in New England where 3 seasons out of the year can be damp and chilly. He never turns on the heat in the car so I have this blanket as a compromise. I am warm and he is comfortable, perfect balance.
customer_reviews.author: julia

customer_reviews.title: Warmth is a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it in the car especially when the blower motor resistor went out on her Heep Grand Cherokee. Makes it bearable until the car warms up even now that her heater is fixed. Just remember to unplug it or your battery will drain.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: but it does have a nice long cord and is convenient to have in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had an on/off switch and heat settings, but it does have a nice long cord and is convenient to have in the car, especially with a small child who can't have a coat on while in the child safety car seat.
customer_reviews.author: September

customer_reviews.title: Great until it quit
customer_reviews.text: We bought this blanket August 2010 to create a warm spot in the car for the dog on cold days. It worked wonderfully, not too hot, warmed quickly enough, big enough to keep me warm when I sat in the car waiting. We were VERY happy with it. We brought it again this season and it is no longer working. I was going to buy it again, but I think I will try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: elledebbie

feature_bullets: Plugs Directly Into Your Cigarette Lighter Socket
8 ft. Power Cord with LED Indicator on the Plug
Blanket Folds Easily for Storage in the Included Zippered Bag (included)
